content.query:
CREATE DATABASE updatalakehouse_trabajofinal;
GO

USE updatalakehouse_trabajofinal;
GO

-----------------------------------------------
--Paso 2: Creacion de dataset por zona de datos
-----------------------------------------------
CREATE SCHEMA master_transaction AUTHORIZATION dbo;
GO

CREATE SCHEMA business_knowa AUTHORIZATION dbo;
GO

-------------------------------------------------------------------------
--Paso 3: Asignación de clave de encriptación y formato de tablas externas
-------------------------------------------------------------------------
CREATE MASTER KEY ENCRYPTION BY PASSWORD = 'p39248J#asdasdiu89yuj1k29sdd'
GO

CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL UPUserIdentity WITH IDENTITY = 'SHARED ACCESS SIGNATURE',
SECRET = '?sv=2021-12-02&ss=bfqt&srt=sco&sp=rwdlacupyx&se=2023-06-30T10:47:11Z&st=2023-04-30T02:47:11Z&spr=https&sig=ezJCBxXXS9BCWwv3OA4CRL7y7BVfumdfdnE0VrqPlGE%3D'
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE ExternalUPDataSource
WITH (
    LOCATION = 'https://dlsupdskuafdevi5l.dfs.core.windows.net/',
    CREDENTIAL = UPUserIdentity
);
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT UPCSVWithHEADERFORMAT
WITH (
    FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT,
    FORMAT_OPTIONS (
        PARSER_VERSION='2.0',
        FIELD_TERMINATOR = ',',
        STRING_DELIMITER = '"',
        FIRST_ROW = 2)
);
GO

-------------------------------------------------------------------------
--Paso 4: Copia de Master a Business
-------------------------------------------------------------------------

-------------------------------------------------------------------------
-- Geologia
-----------------------------------------------
--Paso 01
-----------------------------------------------
SELECT TOP (10) *
From OPENROWSET (BULK '/master/trabjofinal/m_geologia-00001.parquet',
DATA_SOURCE= 'ExternalUPDataSource',
FORMAT ='DELIMITEDTEXT')  AS [file]
GO;
-----------------------------------------------
--Paso 02
-----------------------------------------------
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE master_transaction.dim_business_badges3(
    Id int,
    Name nvarchar(50),
    UserId int,
    Date DATE
)
 WITH (
     LOCATION = '/master/data/m_sharedknow/m_badges/m_badges-00001.parquet',
     DATA_SOURCE = ExternalUPDataSource,  
     FILE_FORMAT = UPParquetFileFormat
 )
GO
-----------------------------------------------
--Paso 03 -- Validación
-----------------------------------------------
SELECT TOP(100) * FROM master_transaction.dim_business_badges3
-----------------------------------------------
--Paso 04
-----------------------------------------------
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE business_knowa.bi_badges3
WITH (
    LOCATION = '/business/b_sharedknow/b_badges/',
    DATA_SOURCE = ExternalUPDataSource,  
    FILE_FORMAT = UPParquetFileFormat
) AS 
SELECT * FROM master_transaction.dim_business_badges3;

SELECT * FROM business_knowa.bi_badges3;
